alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Hyde; Martin; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:31PM EDT until August 01 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN WASHINGTON...NORTHWESTERN HYDE...SOUTHEASTERN MARTIN... NORTHEASTERN BEAUFORT AND WEST CENTRAL TYRRELL COUNTIES... At 531 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ponzer, or 19 miles southeast of Plymouth, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ponzer, Pungo, Pike Road, Leechville, Wenona, Hinson, Pungo Lake, Phelps Lake, Alligator Lake and Long Acre VFD. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
